m_szDocTitle: Energy Supply System and Operating Method - Zentrum Fuer Sonnenenegie-und Wasserstoff-Forschun g Baden-Wuertlemberg
m_szDocSumamry: Energy Supply System and Operating Method United States Patent Application 20120091730 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: An energy supply system is provided with an electricity generating device for regeneratively generating electrical energy that can be fed into an electricity supply grid. The energy supply system includes an electricity generating device for regeneratively generating electrical energy which can be fed into an electricity supply grid, a hydrogen generating device for generating hydrogen using electrical energy from the regenerative electricity generating device, a metha
